data.title: Ocean's Eleven (2001)
data.meta_description: Financial analysis of Ocean's Eleven (2001) including budget, domestic and international box office gross, DVD and Blu-ray sales reports, total earnings and profitability.
data.text:
Full financial estimates for this film, including domestic and international box office, video sales, video rentals, TV and ancillary revenue are available through our research services. For more information, please contact us at research@the-numbers.com.

Leading Cast

George Clooney Danny Ocean Matt Damon Linus Caldwell Andy Garcia Terry Benedict Brad Pitt Rusty Ryan

Supporting Cast

Julia Roberts Tess Ocean Casey Affleck Virgil Malloy Scott Caan Turk Malloy Don Cheadle Roscoe Means Elliott Gould Reuben Tishkoff Eddie Jemison Livingston Dell Bernie Mac Frank Catton Shaobo Qin Yen Carl Reiner Saul Bloom

For a description of the different acting role types we use to categorize acting perfomances, see our Glossary.

Production and Technical Credits

Steven Soderbergh Director Ted Griffin Screenwriter Harry Brown Screenwriter Charles Lederer Screenwriter George Clayton Johnson Story Creator Jack Golden Russell Story Creator Peter Andrews Cinematographer Stephen Mirrione Editor David Holmes Composer Philip Messina Production Designer Keith P. Cunningham Art Director Nancy Deren Set Designer George R. Lee Set Designer Dawn Brown Manser Set Designer Barbara Ann Spencer Set Designer Eric Sundahl Set Designer Kristen Toscano Messina Set Decorator Jeffrey Kurland Costume Designer Paul Ledford Sound Mixer Larry Blake Supervising Sound Editor Gregory Jacobs Assistant Director Debra Zane Casting Director Bruce Berman Executive Producer

The bold credits above the line are the "above-the-line" credits, the other the "below-the-line" credits.
